title.rendered: “Israel’s Chief of Staff on Dismantling Hamas: A National Task – An Exclusive Tour in Rafah, Gaza Strip”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

“The Chief of Staff in Rafah: “Completely dismantling Hamas is a national task of the State of Israel.”

The Chief of Staff, Lieutenant General Herzl Halevi, conducted today (Wednesday) a situation assessment and tour in the Rafah area of the Gaza Strip with the Southern Command Commander, Major General Yaron Finkelman, the commander of the 162nd Division, Brigadier General Itzik Cohen and additional commanders.

Here is a video clip of the Chief of Staff’s remarks: https://bit.ly/4aFiTj1

Here is a video on the topic: https://bit.ly/3V1WpmL

Here are the pictures on the topic: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC290524

The full words of the Chief of Staff are attached: “Look, we are here for a few reasons. One, it is the last brigade that remains with full capabilities, so we want to dismantle the Rafah brigade.
But we will deepen the achievement and we will bring Hamas to very low places; this requires a lot of professionalism, it requires a lot of determination, it requires a lot of values, to know that completely dismantling Hamas is a national task of the State of Israel.
I am very, very impressed, I leave here with a feeling that there is a very, very professional action here, high quality; there is learning here, which is a very, very important thing. You are advancing, there are very high achievements here.”
